name: Polymorph
descriptionText: transform a minion into a 1/1 sheep

descriptionText: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.

descriptionText: Discover a weapon from any class.Add it to your deck with +2/+2

descriptionText: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.

descriptionText: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.

descriptionText: Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.

name: Rapid Fire
descriptionText: Twinspell: Deal 1 damage.

name: Swamp King Dred
descriptionText: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.

name: Lazul's Scheme
descriptionText: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by 1 until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)

name: High Priest Amet
descriptionText: Whenever you summon a minion, set its Health equal to this minion's.

name: Learn Draconic
descriptionText: Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.

name: Strength in Numbers
descriptionText:
Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions.
Reward: Summon a minion from your deck.

name: Swarm of Locusts
descriptionText: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush

name: Locust
descriptionText: Rush

name: Sprint
descriptionText: Draw 4 cards.

descriptionText: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck and battlefield.

descriptionText: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.

descriptionText: Taunt

descriptionText: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1

descriptionText: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
